titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas by the examinations of divers persons we find that a Romish priest, calling himself father Christopher Browne, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin the 15th day of April, 1691. and in the third year of their Majesties Reign.".
For the arrest of Father Christopher Browne and others.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 199. find in p.2) pro- Their.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
